active_projects.description: Update CLAUDE.md to accurately describe this NixOS dotfiles repository instead of Neovim-only configuration
Update README.md (Claude system architecture doc) to reflect NixOS dotfiles context
Fix conflicting specification in meta.md about directory creation - remove line 29 that contradicts lazy directory creation rule in state-management.md

artifacts.summary: Comparative analysis confirming specification conflict exists in both repos; no plan creation is by design

active_projects.description: Maintain ~/.claude/settings.json via home-manager similar to other config files like wezterm.lua

Create context/project/nix/ directory structure with domain knowledge (Nix language, flakes, modules), patterns (module patterns, overlays), standards (style guide), and tools (home-manager, nixos-rebuild guides)

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report covering Nix language fundamentals, flakes, NixOS modules, home-manager, overlays, derivations, style guide, and tool workflows with recommended content structure for 11 context files

active_projects.description: Create .claude/rules/nix.md with Nix-specific development rules auto-applied to *.nix files, covering formatting, module structure, and flake patterns
Create nix-research-agent mirroring neovim-research-agent pattern with Nix domain knowledge: Nix language, flakes, NixOS modules, home-manager, overlays, derivations
Create nix-implementation-agent mirroring neovim-implementation-agent pattern with Nix-specific verification (nix flake check, nixos-rebuild build, home-manager build) and phase-based execution
Create skill-nix-research thin wrapper skill that delegates to nix-research-agent following the established skill pattern (preflight, delegate, postflight)
Create skill-nix-implementation thin wrapper skill that delegates to nix-implementation-agent following the established skill pattern (preflight, delegate, postflight)
Update skill-orchestrator to add language='nix' routing that delegates to nix-specific agents for research and implementation
Update settings.json to add allowed Bash commands for Nix tooling: nix, nixos-rebuild, home-manager, nix-shell, nix-env
